lines.text: Annie... I'd like to marry you.
According to heaven, we already are.
You know what we've never done. We've never... danced. I'm going arent I?
Don't be sad. Don't get sad mike.
Why does it have to be you?
It's not sad. I'm going to be somebody's baby.

I was in love too. My wife wanted to spend the rest of our lives together. She wanted to get married, we did. She wanted to have kids, we did. She wanted to spend the rest of our lives together and did in each other arms, we did. We can't.
Remember Heaven, Elmo? All you have to do is think about where you want to be and you're there.

[Crashing home drunk]
Oh Daddy! Why doesn't he love me?
